page.title: 06Customs in East Huntspill
page.content: The harvest home is for celebrating and thanking god for harvest and hay making. During the Harvest Home there is a Church service,a lunch tea,a procession,a fair,and a disco to which anybody can go.Early every year we have a disco to choose a Harvest Home Queen.The Harvest Home Committee organises these events.The Harvest Home started many years ago.Nearly every year they have at least 500 to 600 people attend.The organisers say that it will never be too expensive to hold.At the fair of the Harvest Home we have many rides and the tea tent is enormous.There are also a lot of stalls and at 7.00pm the procession comes through.One of the nicer customs!
